exceptions.exn: In environment m : nat f : nat -> R -> R k : nat x : R H : locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (0 <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) Unable to unify "locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (0 <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t)" with "ex_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) 0 m) k x".

In environment n, m : nat f : nat -> R -> R k : nat x : R H : locally x (fun t : R => forall l j : nat, (S n <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) IHn : locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (n <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> ex_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) n m) k x Unable to unify "ex_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) n m) k x" with "ex_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) (S n) m) k x".

original: intro H. induction n. -- simpl. apply H. -- simpl. unfold is_derive_n in H. simpl in H. apply IHn. apply H.
